name: Cubic Sandbox
description:
Cubic Sandbox is an open-world physical sandbox where you can manipulate various objects and experiment with physics with your friends.

Features:
- PvP
- Multiplayer
- Free world
- 2 locations: Desert and Green Field
- 10+ characters
- 10+ vehicles (land and air)
- 50+ buildings in inventory
- 400+ props and items in inventory
- Building system
